title: Pixel II XL with Bose QC35 II headphones- Keeps Disconnecting during calls
content:
Bose QC 35 II keeps disconnecting during calls if I am using Mac when i receive calls. With my iphone 6S this never happened. Ive tried everything from restarting to clearing the device list etc
QC 35 II : 4.3.6
Pixel 2 XL: Latest update Android 9
